import React, { useState } from 'react'; import DataWithAll from './DataWithAll'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import 'jquery/dist/jquery.js'; import 'bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.js'; const OurPlans = () =>{ const card = (val, key) =>{ return( <>

{val.title}

{val.treks}Treks

{val.days}D/N

{val.rupee}RS

{}
...
) } return( <>

Our Plans

{ DataWithAll.map(card) }
) } export default OurPlans;
